name: Jelly-Jelly
description:
Game is best played in fullscreen. Please click the button in the bottom right corner of the frame.

Jelly-Jelly tells the epic tale of a jellyfish trying to find its place in the world.

Swim around the claymation environment, collecting starfish and avoiding the angry sea urchins (those guys are real spiky jerks!)

Controls:

W or Space - thrust

A & D or arrow keys - steer

Made during ToJam12 by the dogged and mucilaginous ButterBrains

Toby Dixon, Aaron Gordon, Nick Perrin, Adrian Smith,
